website_summaries.verdict: The BookBook is made incredibly well, it’s got gorgeous looks, and the leather portfolio keeps your 12.9-inch iPad Pro safe.
pros: The built-in stand has multiple angles, and the case looks like an encyclopedia
cons: It doesn’t support the iPad Pro’s smart automatic wake and sleep functionality

customer_reviews.title: I love them. I just bought a new 2017 iPad ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Bookbook for my MacAir and an old iPad. I love them. I just bought a new 2017 iPad and ordered a Bookbook for this iPad. It smelled musty and mildewy just like others have described, a horrible strong odor. I contacted the manufacturer and they said it must have been stored incorrectly. They suggested returning it. I did so and Amazon promptly sent me another. The second one also stank. I returned it to Amazon. Then I ordered one directly from the manufacturer. It stank. They said I could return it or try another. I said why not. It arrived yesterday and the 4th time was the charm, no smell ! So beware of the stench.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Borenstein

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit.
customer_reviews.text: Interior leather holding the ipad was thin, did not line up with center button, make finger recognition impossible. Outer zippered case operated just fine..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: product was used for one week and the zipper broke junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: this is junk crappy zipper broke the first week i used it save your 100 dollars your throwing i away your money no service no refund? no replacment ???? amendment : amazon corrected the problem and replaced the product i will see if the new one holds up still i dont think this thing is worth the price
customer_reviews.author: mario medri

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have two other BookBook cases for my mini and they both fit well and feel like quality covers. This one for my 2018 iPad doesn’t fit that well. When the iPad is in the internal case and is lined up, it’s too wide- snug it up and the cutouts are way off. The leather on the outside doesn’t seem to be attached either (except the edges where sewn).
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case but needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this case because I have one for my regular iPad, and absolutely say it's my favorite case of all time. I purchased this one for the white iPad Pro I have, and the fit was just not good. First of all, the sleeve that the iPad slides into was not snug like my other one. Secondly, the device sat off-center in the cutouts, which was very noticeable with a white device. Thirdly, when I turned the device horizontally, there was a lot of tug on the leather sleeve at the top of the screen. This case needs some trouble-shooting done to fix these issues.
customer_reviews.author: RKG&PEG

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if there was something causing a capacitance touch ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if there was something causing a capacitance touch somewhere, but the interface was completely unusable when it was inside the sleeve. I'm a huge fan of 12 South, so this was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: etc

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: I got a good price on my ipad cover, I think because it's an older model tablet. The case is beautiful, nice leather, and looks like a vintage book. Everyone who sees it asks me where I got it. I have a matching Book Book case for my iphone. Great quality products.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not for the new iPad Pro 12.9 Inch (2018 version)
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product in general - I have had these BookBooks for many other devices in previous years and love every one of them - but this one is not for the new iPad Pro (2018 version). It was too long and a bit wide for my new device so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: High quality exterior, zipper broke right away.
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke after a month, now the case is on my 3 year olds ipad and does well protecting it. The cover is pretty well weighted and It closes really nicely and stays closed without being zipped. Not a huge fan of the leather material they used to physically hold ipad in the case, it feels really cheap. That said its doing its job and I know the ipad isnt going to fall out. The exterior of this case is very nice, with excellent painted details and high quality leather. Its doing a decent job but I cant say I would spend $80 bucks on it again.
customer_reviews.author: Evan La Haye

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. And initially I did. But this is now the 2nd time I have bought a Twelve South BookBook and both times the zipper has broken. The zippers on these products cannot withstand even the most basic open and closing over time. Both zipper broke within a year. Since I bought it for this zipper function, I am very disappointed. For the price point, I expect a higher quality product. I simply cannot understand why this company put great quality into every aspect of this product (case, both inside and out) but installed a shoddy zipper. At this point I cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David Matvey

customer_reviews.title: It looks exactly like a book
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made I pad cover. It looks exactly like a book. It hides it well. Easy to use; the cover bends easily to put behind it or you can have it stand. Very nicely made. My daughter has another one and she has had it for years. I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great concept - not practical
customer_reviews.text: The case is ascetically pleasing. It smells good, it looks good, but falls short in performance. The case is awkward to use in landscape mode in comparison to other iPad cases. This case has two ways to prop up the iPad case in landscape mode - both are awkward. The zipper is poor quality and on my first night of use it didn't catch the teeth properly and took a bit of work to get it to sit right to zip up. In any case for $80 I expect perfection in concept and use. I will be returning this ASAP and going back to my old case. Two stars for cool factor!
customer_reviews.author: Vickery

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. Unique look.
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments all the time on my iPad cover. most of the comments I get are "I didn't realize that was an iPad until you opened it up." -It protects the iPad reasonably well. I dropped it a couple times from a foot or 2 off the ground with no ill affects. -The brown cover shows marks on it very easily, like if you run your finger nail over it, but over time it adds a really cool vintage look to it. I personally look at that as a cool feature rather than a drawback. -It's just an all around beautiful case. I love it and think it's 100% worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Spider Jerusalem

customer_reviews.title: The near best money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: Snug, classy and well protected loving this case. Folks it worth the extra dollars! Word of caution dont get it wet water will stain your case. Only observation is the leather border around the screen does not lay flush it lifts up a bit nothing monumental, but for the money it should have a perfect fit this fits near-perfect. This condition happens on other bookbooks as well. I'm using this with the iPad 4 aka New iPad or iPad with Retina.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: POOR FIT AND NOT HAPPY AT ALL...quality of materials is very good just a very bad fit...
customer_reviews.author: Javee333

customer_reviews.title: Protective and stylish cover
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of a Twelve South BookBook iPad cover. The first was for an iPad 2, which I bought five years ago. The cover stood the test of time, for sure. I recently bought an iPad Air 2 and got another BookBook cover for it. I still love it! I don't have a problem with the zippers, thankfully. My only gripe is that it is sometimes difficult to get to the volume control buttons and to connect my charger. This is definitely not a deal breaker for me. I love that I can zip my expensive iPad completely up. A must have for tablets!
customer_reviews.author: thehumblenarcissist

customer_reviews.title: Best iPad cover - Wears very well
customer_reviews.text: I had a Twelve South BookBook for my iPad Mini that was many years old. This held up really well to the use. Though it did get worn, the wear just added to the character of the BookBook. There was no question what I was going to get for my next iPad!
customer_reviews.author: kjn

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: The leather is great, the lining seems to be suede, but might be microfiber. It looks so much nicer than some of the cheap vinyl cases.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: This case is beautiful, however I just can't get past the smell ...
customer_reviews.text: This case is beautiful, however I just can't get past the smell of the leather. It has a very distinct, very powerful odor. It's not a terrible smell, but it's a smell nevertheless. When my 10 year old got home from school she immediately wrinkled her nose and asked, "What's that SMELL?!" upon entering the house. I tried leaving the case outside for a few hours but it still reeks. Sadly, this will be going back.
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: First one lasted 3 years, bought another one
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. The first one lasted for 3 years before the zipper finally broke beyond repair. That said, the first one had one of the original zipper pulls break within the first year, but the other continued to work so I didn't worry about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: The cover scratches despite my trying to be extremely careful.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful cover, and it is everything advertised. I cannot give it five stars because it scratches easily. You have seen leather where it seems impervious to any markings, and other leathers that show scratches and markings. This cover shows every single mark it comes into contact with, and it's always in the back of my mind to be extremely careful with wherever I lay it (or put on top of it). I even have to be careful how I pack my backpack so something doesn't inadvertently scratch it. Otherwise, a beautiful cover. I guess the scratches are supposed to add to the character of the cover, but all I see are a bunch of scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It’s two pieces, awkward design for the camera. Fair quality leather. Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but I don’t think it’s quality is as good as the $20 case I bought for my air2. If I knew the case was two pieces I would not of bought. Not going to return it but it is just a temporary case. Using the camera is awkward at best.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Engie

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love it - it is so cool and a great concept. The distressed cover can be tolerated, though other scratches are easily made in it. But the snap broke off the first week I had the first one. The second one had scratches/markings that made it appear damaged. The zipper, rarely used, broke on the third one I had after only 6 months. Sad to say, but I'm breaking free from 12 South and looking elsewhere. Quality needs much improvement...especially at that price.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sturdy iPad cover that makes your iPad look like a book. However, you have to "unfold" it to take a picture, which is a little awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: IF you need a case for an iPad, 2nd,3rd,4th gen., BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: This is an unbelievable deal for those of us who don't upgrade every year. Buy this book and you will be happy with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gremma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ‘booklike’ Case for tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love the appearance of this case, however found it difficult to install my iPad Pro into the case, and because has to be repeatedly removed to take pictures, it’s quite time consuming. Access to on/off switch, volume control and charger is quite fiddly too, the cut out slots overlap. I love the brand but quite disappointed by these problems which could’ve been easily solved at time of manufacture. Pricey too.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sugra V. Ali

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: Pros: When closed it looks like a well used book. The zip shut option keeps the Ipad well protected. Cons: It is a little awkward to get to the on/off button (zipper in the way). With time I may get better at snapping it to the base, but because it is so difficult, it makes me not want to undo it in order use the options of different positions for the device.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Everything but the zipper...
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like an old book. It smelled like old leather when I first got it (a year later it doesn’t really have a smell). It has protected my iPad through several drops. But... For @ $70 expect that there would be a better quality zipper or a better fastener.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Loblaw

customer_reviews.title: BEST BOOK COVER EVER
customer_reviews.text: Love it 100% and it's real leather quality. Looks vintage like a book but everyone will love how it holds an iPad inside.
customer_reviews.author: love huki

customer_reviews.title: No problems with this case
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this case based on the other reviews, but there was a Black Friday lightning deal (not that much of a "deal" actually - only $20 off) so I went for it. It's been almost a week and I haven't experienced any of the problems I read about in other reviews. It looks great. The zipper opens easily. The ipad is secure inside. I haven't tried to use the "stand" yet so we'll see what happens there. This is my first case, so I can't compare it to other cases, but so far it's suiting my needs just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this iPad cover. It's so beautiful and smells good (leather). Everyone is tricked thinking its an old book & when they see it's my iPad they think its really cool. The only problem I had with it, & why I gave it a 4, is that the part where you plug in the charger is slightly blocked and keeps it from getting a good lock in, so you have to be careful & make sure it's still charging when you set it down.
customer_reviews.author: Jinnie L

customer_reviews.title: One Star is being generous...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the ipad bookbook and also iphone 4s. The iPhone is quality leather and appears to be a quality product. What in the world happened to the iPad bookbook? It looks and feels like cheap cardboard and the zipper is cheap and gets stuck all the time. Apparently the company moved it's manufacturing and cut corners to cheapen this product. Too Bad! It will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: ChiBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I had a bookbook for my Mac before, and when I got my iPad Pro I knew what brand case to get. I like the apple pen holder inside too, it's a snug fit. Really does its job as a case. The only downsides are the little frays in the picture below (I just tuck them back in, it's not too serious) and just lining up the buttons in the back so they clip in place. Little minor things, but overall great!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Dad loves it, tells me all the time.  Great father's day gift!!  Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the cover for my dad as a father's day gift about six months ago. He absolutely loves it and reminds me that he loves it each time I help him with his iPad (twice a month). The leather feels great and the inside cloth is smooth. The design is top notch and the utility is spot on. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eman Sanatkar

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the "Book Book" on the spine. Either leave it blank or customize it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara L. Lanning

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I decided to splurge on this product and am very pleased. It is genuine leather and is very sturdily and beautifully designed. The buttons on the inside keep the ipad secured and stable. I like the ability to use it as a stand in different ways. My only qualm is the price. I purchased a $20 case that is just as functional. An additional $60 seems a bit much for a better layout.
customer_reviews.author: nfrank2

customer_reviews.title: ... connecter cutout is a little small & it's not easy to plug in without having to manipulate the Book ...
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the lightning connecter cutout is a little small & it's not easy to plug in without having to manipulate the Book Book considerably. Other than that, it's a fantastic product. Top quality workmanship, excellent protection, great looks. Well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: River City Junction / Tone King Records

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, awesome look
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a present for my husband and he LOVES it. He is a pastor and when speaking from computer notes for a message or a wedding, it is much nicer looking than just seeing the iPad. Nice quality, the only minus we could see is that it does not have an interior loop for a stylus. Great product, would absolutely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Great leather case for your iPad
customer_reviews.text: Genuine leather wears beautifully and is one of the reasons the Twelve South case has always been at the top of the list. Stitching and detail work very well done. Binding looks amazing and blends in with other books if placed on a bookshelf.
customer_reviews.author: MTC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I would have found this product a couple of years ago, but nonetheless I am extremely pleased with this product and the Book Book for the MacBook Pro. I have tried several cases for the iPad and never found one that met my needs, looked great, and felt right. This is it. They are a little overpriced: I think 49.99 would be more appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case. Getting a lot of likes! Need one for my iPhone XR
customer_reviews.author: Mccallmommy

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but fit is not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The cover is of food quality,but the inside sleeve that holds the iPad is very loose,making it very hard to access the buttons, headphone jack,this the 3 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: ARAVIND SUGAVANAM

customer_reviews.title: Best iPad case EVER
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this case. I have gotten so many compliments on it and have never once regretted spending the extra money. It looks amazing, and I, as a book lover, love that I can pretend I am reading from a book instead of an iPad when I am reading e-books. I cannot recommend this highly enough, especially to fellow book lovers.
customer_reviews.author: AMCBooknerd

customer_reviews.title: Major design flaw makes case NOT worth the money
customer_reviews.text: There are no auto shut off magnets in this case. This was a conscious design choice by Twelve South that they have chosen NOT to fix. This makes the case basically worthless. The on off button can easily be pressed if you slide the iPad in the Book Book case into your bag. Without the auto shut off magnets, you will find your battery WAY lower than before you used this case. I have reverted back to a $20 case because my iPad was often dead at the end of a single day walking around in my backpack laptop case.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Kingston

customer_reviews.title: GREAT cover!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT cover for my iPad. I also have the one for my iPhone and my MacBook Pro. They make your device look like a book. This has a holder for your Apple Pencil. It holds it nicely and securely. Definitely buy this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Edward T. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good case but measuremeants are wonky
customer_reviews.text: The case is beautiful and constructed with good materials however, the space the iPad slides into is not cut correctly and my iPad moves around a bit and the home button is half hidden by the leather.
customer_reviews.author: DocBrutus101

customer_reviews.title: Awsome case!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a targus cover for my iPad2 since i got it. It was just OK. We found 12 South last year when I got a Macbook Air and an iPad Mini. we absolutely LOVE these cases. Not only are they stylish but they are also ruggid and if you didn't know what it was you;d THINK this was actually a book! If I could give it more stars I would!!!
customer_reviews.author: Remmy the Knife

customer_reviews.title: I love it and couldn't see myself using any other case ...
customer_reviews.text: Almost 5 years and I am still using this case. I love it and couldn't see myself using any other case ever. The more is wears the better it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Cluecas

customer_reviews.title: Best ipad cover I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great protector and cover for my iPad. I have it in my car during the day and it is thin enough to slide down next to my seat and no one would ever expect it to be an iPad. The only down side was that it did not have a magnet in it for auto turn-off when the cover is closed. I mounted a small refrigerator magnetic from with a small piece of leather on the edge next to the zipper and it works perfectly.. I get compliments from everyone that sees it.....super product.
customer_reviews.author: Philip B. Winston

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: We have now had the brown BookBook case on our iPad for almost a month and we love the case. It is well made and so far the only thing we don't like is how you have to fold the case around to use the camera. Having said that the only solution would be to drill a hole int he leather case, but we prefer to fold the case. It looks great and we have gotten all sorts of compliments about it. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Huck Fin

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great, feels great, but.....
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works great, feels great, but.....there should have been a hole for he camera. The hole can be something that can be covered with a flap or something. Come on, it's the 21st century. Dont tell me they cant make a little tiny hole with some type of covering to hide it on the BOok bOOk. Also, the zipper is great but hard to close it once it is open. Furthermore, how and why the heck there is no magnet in it and why there is no pen holder inside, I just dont know. Otherwise it is a great ipad cover/protection.
customer_reviews.author: sir_rey

customer_reviews.title: Just Love This!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this last year, and love it! Looks great, durable, and handles well. Just recently changed to Otter for extra protection around middle school kids, but love this for home or non-school handling. Everyone is always surprised when they realize it is an IPAD!
customer_reviews.author: GrayMatter

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly pleased with my Book Book case for my Ipad. Ive owned one in the past but for an iPhone. The only reason for the 4 stars is that the first one I recieved had zipper issues. Ultimately, this issue was resolved quickly and now im receiving compliments out the woodworks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andre Rolle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this case, my only wish was there were other color options.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book book because my uncle has one and I appreciated the high quality look of a real book. When I received the item it satisfied all my expectations and I was happy with my new book book. After using it for about 2 weeks, the snap where the ipad is connected to the case suddenly came detached. I was surprised because knowing the high quality nature of twelvesouth I would expect that the case would have lasted a long time. This was disappointing and I'm not sure if I should contact twelvesouth or amazon to see if I can return it. The item should last at least a little longer than 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: There isn't anything else like it. I get positive feedback all the time.
customer_reviews.author: anesthesia man

customer_reviews.title: I am happy to say it has been great
customer_reviews.text: I read a few of the negative review and was a little nervous if the case would be high quality. I am happy to say it has been great, I have had it for a few months and it is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerrit Lydecker Jr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two now, one as a gift, and had a local shop add initials in gold on the cover. It's a wonderful, sturdy product and the leather is wearing beautifully as if it were truly a fine, leather bound book.
customer_reviews.author: Aphrodite K. Konduros

customer_reviews.title: Misfit
customer_reviews.text: I love the style but did not fit my iPad well at all.
customer_reviews.author: PANorton

customer_reviews.title: Typical 12 South quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought I got the wrong item, but I think this was the old style since it doesn't have a slid out tray for the camera that is described. Otherwise, it works fine for the iPad 4th gen. and looks like my other 12 South case for the MacBook Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Awkward design
customer_reviews.text: I expected Twelve South's iPad case to be as wonderful as their iPhone case--which gets 5 stars from me, but the iPad case design is not well thought out. The most annoying feature is the orientation: iPad must be inserted so that the camera lens is next to the spine, making it awkward to use the camera. The second thing is the zipper: it was balky, which wasn't a deal breaker, since I would never use it, but the zipper detracts from the case's otherwise appealing style. Third, the tab to prop up iPad wasn't high enough for me. I returned it and bought a Snugg.
customer_reviews.author: az quilter

customer_reviews.title: as it has a great feel and look
customer_reviews.text: I'm overall positive about the product, as it has a great feel and look, and protects the iPad in a good way. For some reason, it's hard for it to charge inside the cover, and I'm not sure why the cord isn't inserting properly. Other than that, it seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Harden

customer_reviews.title: No camera hole!
customer_reviews.text: This item is beautiful. No doubt. Although it fit my iPad perfectly, this cover does not have a camera hole therefore it is totally useless to me. You'll need to remove entire cover if you need to take photographs, use FaceTime, etc. Please make one with the camera opening.
customer_reviews.author: RCF

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely obsessed with this case! I think it looks amazing. It's really everything I want & I just love the vintage book cover. I get compliments all the time! Great buy, the price is steep but the protection it gives and it's great looks make it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, elegant, a delight to look at and hold. And practical.
customer_reviews.author: Pswkb

customer_reviews.title: Oh so Good
customer_reviews.text: I guess you can tell from the heading what I am about to write. I love it absolutely. Pluses : Great looks Holds iPad securely Very well made Perfect for using in bed and couch (lazy bugger) Negatives : Can only use front camera :( (must pull it out to use back camera kinda sux ! A bit on the expensive side (but you get what you pay for) Conclusion : If you like that rugged good looks get it! If you need the back camera all the time keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking cover
customer_reviews.text: iPad fits in perfectly and when sitting on the table, shelf... it looks like a nice old book. Fits in briefcase well and love that it can be zippered up. Wish like some other covers it would shut the iPad off when closed, which it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: B. Burk

customer_reviews.title: Best case on the market
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this iPad cover. It's the first and only one I have ever bought. I was a little concerned about the hole for the charger since mine is the new smaller plug but it works just fine. I have no complaints, this thing is amazing and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Dana C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The product was defective. I could not use it ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was defective. I could not use it because of the smell of mildew. I'm trying to air it out but that is not working
customer_reviews.author: Horse Lover

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have a second gen iPad Pro and I adore this product! Rugged and classy looking at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Best iPad cover out there!
customer_reviews.text: This is buy far and away the best iPad cover out there. It does everything I could want from a case and despite what you read online, if you treat the zippers right they will outlast your iPad. It's discrete, functional, totally looks better the more it gets scuffed up, and as long as you zip it up when you are done with it, it provides a superb level of protection. We started out with one for me, but I'm happy to announce we are now a BookBook family with another on the way!
customer_reviews.author: J. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doubles as a nice drawing stand as well as a case. Convenient holder for Apple Pencil
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: The perfect cover for your iPad!
customer_reviews.text: Another fantastic cover by BookBook! I love the new design where the iPad slips into the leather to keep the iPad from falling out. Be sure you are careful to order the size case that is right for your model iPad. I can see where there may be some concern over the longevity of the zipper that closes the case. It does not seem to be as strong as the zipper from the older design but with care I fully expect that it will last the life of our iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Allyssa B.

customer_reviews.title: My Book Book
customer_reviews.text: I love my Bookbook. I now call my iPad "Book Book" instead of iPad. This is a great cover and makes the iPad easy to handle. However it does make taking pictures a little more difficult, but it still unsnaps from the case in a tri-fold design.
customer_reviews.author: E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect design and style!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Have one for my other IPad and MacBook as well.
customer_reviews.author: mary jane ferland

customer_reviews.title: BookBook for IPad
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cover for about 2 weeks now, and I love it. However, I do find that when the charger is plugged in, sometimes it does get slightly dislodged by the case and then isn't charging when I think that it is. Plugging in the charger requires a little effort, as well. A magnet shut-off would be great. Other than those 2 things, I love the case :) I have not had difficulty with the zipper, as others have reported. The leather is beautiful, nice quality, and smells great :). I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy K.

customer_reviews.title: They are very good quality and age just makes them better
customer_reviews.text: This is the second book book that I've owned for an iPad. They are very good quality and age just makes them better. It took about 3 years for my first book book's zipper to break on my previous iPad. The zippers on this newer model seem more or less the same.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Williams

customer_reviews.title: Lovely to look at and touch
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a birthday present to somebody who 'has everything'. It is beautiful to look at, not too thick, practical in use in all angles, and was an instant success. It is great to hold when reading ebooks.
customer_reviews.author: Rungsted

customer_reviews.title: Crafted beauty for iPad
customer_reviews.text: This is my second book book cover from twelve south. Incredible product, well crafted and conceals my iPad beautifully while protecting it!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Striker

customer_reviews.title: Great protection, beautiful case
customer_reviews.text: This case gives me quick access to my ipad (rather than the previous slip case I was using) - it is strong enough to protect it but looks fantastic with beautiful vintage feeling leather.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel_geek

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic blend of old and new tech. Almost steam punk in detail. A nice personal touch of the old word in thie new tech environment. I'm not a great fan of the zipper though...BT of a giveaway
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Stott

customer_reviews.title: WARNING - Zipper only lasts for one year
customer_reviews.text: WARNING - do NOT purchase! The zipper broke a little after one year and the company refused to replace or repair it. On their website, they do not have a warning that the zipper ONLY lasts for one year but they should!
customer_reviews.author: A Johansson

customer_reviews.title: Love Book Book for iPhone & iPad
customer_reviews.text: Several months ago I found Book Book for my iPhone (wallet & phone case all in one) and today received the Book Book for my iPad. Same great quality in both products. Worth every penny & now with this case that props up the iPad on an angle I enjoy typing so much more on my iPad...less typos too!
customer_reviews.author: Scout Finch

customer_reviews.title: Great case love the look and feel of the leather
customer_reviews.text: Great case love the look and feel of the leather. Only drawback is the way you insert the iPad can make it hard to use the volum buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore S. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Twelve South BookBook Volume 2 for 2nd, 3rd and 4th Generation iPad
customer_reviews.text: This cover is great. Ordered for my husband who is a little eccentric anyway and when asked how much he likes it he responded "I love it". He wanted it in Vintage Brown and I must say it really does look like it's been around for some time. For anyone looking for a pristine looking cover, this not for you. It truly looks like an old book, just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Impwoman

customer_reviews.title: Love both.
customer_reviews.text: Although at first I found the BookBook a little awkward, four months on I absolutely couldn't live without it. Also have the iPhone model. Love both.
customer_reviews.author: pamibe

customer_reviews.title: Great looking case!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case for my 4th gen iPad. I must say it looks and feels awesome. It's expensive as far as cases go, but what you get is a high quality product that will go noticed. It offers adequate protection and is versatile as a stand as well. I think I've found "the one." :)
customer_reviews.author: dennymenny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much. It stays in plan sight and no one knows what's inside.
customer_reviews.author: S. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Best iPad cover...ever!
customer_reviews.text: I searched a long time for an iPad cover that was unique and functional. This is it! The quality is excellent and the iPad slides in to completely protect it - even the corners. Everyone who sees it absolutely loves it (once they get over the fact that it is, indeed, an iPad cover and not an antique book). I highly recommend this product. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Coffield

customer_reviews.title: Looks very good
customer_reviews.text: looks good just not sure how practical it is when using iPad since it doesn't have "standup" capabilty. But works to camouflage that it is an iPad very well when carrying it around
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE! but heartbroken ;(
customer_reviews.text: was in LOVE with these! but my zipper broke...it came alittle stiff (the leather portion on bottom of item) and so the zipper was always warped in that area. ;( bought a few of these for family, friends and authors, and even though they complained at least mne was fine.one of the three friends i purchased for zipper broke on her (4th gen) ipad. we handle ours pretty gingerly but now my (4th gen) iphone carrier completely fell apart. im embarrassed to open it up but hopelessly attached to it! hopefully they were just defective pieces...so disappointed. i still get compliments and i love the products but my three are in sad condition! ;(
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the new iPad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband when he got his new iPad, and he loves it! It looks great, smells great, and protects the iPad while looking very stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Symphonysgrandma

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I gave an identical 5-star rating for the iphone 5 version. You won't regret this purchase. It's handsome and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: BooLou

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and protects well in my opinion. Use it carry my iPad around the campus. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: crowccrn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this case. It's well built, long lasting, easy ports for everything. I just can't say enough good things.
customer_reviews.author: RenaissanceMan

customer_reviews.title: Super nice!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is really nice. It offers great protection to damage and truly does look like an old book. The construction is top notch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill J.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel and look of the cover. It needs an opening for the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool cover. Looks old and tattered like a favorite book. Well my ipad is my new fav book so might as well give it a "worn look".
customer_reviews.author: Passion222

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This item is fantastic! It was exactly what I had expected and looks wonderful! I highly recommend this item to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: AnonGuyFawkes

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy a case that reflected the value of the contents while making it obscure enough from unwanted attention. This case works on both counts. I absolutely love this product. I actually spend more time admiring it than my iPad itself at times. Great build quality and the smell of leather communicates the value. It has also become a great conversation piece among friends.
customer_reviews.author: Huey Cuffie

product_meta.title: Twelve South BookBook for iPad Pro (12.9-inch, 1st Gen) | Hardback Leather case, Apple Pencil Storage and Easel for iPad Pro
product_meta.description: Style:iPad Pro 12.9" Gen 1| Color:BrownBookBook for iPad Pro is a gorgeous leather case reminiscent of a vintage sketchbook. Designed to free the artist in you, BookBook tilts iPad Pro to the perfect angle for typing or effortless drawing and sketching of your NEXT Creation. When your work is done, fold BookBook into presentation/display mode to show off your masterpiece. Or use display mode for watching a movie on the beautiful iPad Pro display. When the show’s over, know that your work is safely housed in a protective Portfolio designed for the digital world. BookBook for iPad Pro has built-in holster for your Apple Pencil or stylus. Let BookBook inspire the artist in you.
feature_bullets: Vintage style leather portfolio case for iPad Pro
Unique Book design protects and disguises iPad for added security
Integrated kickstand angles iPad for comfortable sketching and typing
Converts to adjustable Display and movie watching stand
Interior pocket stores Apple Pencil or iPad stylus inside spine
Compatible with iPad Pro 12.9-inch (1st gen. only)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars339 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
